title: Lost.Planet.3.Repack.R.G.Catalyst
description:
Lost.Planet.3.Repack.R.G.Catalyst

Year: 2013
Publication Type: Repack /R.G.Catalyst
Tablet: enclosing (FAIRLIGHT)
Version: 1.0
Language: RUS, ENG
Voice sLanguage: ENG

Description:

Continued fi action Lost Planet reveals terrifying new details about the notorious 
planet EDN III and the history of its colonization of the people. Extreme danger 
and thrills? Three times more than before! The protagonist of Lost Planet 3 - pilot Jim, 
who left Earth to perform a very difficult and risky, but very lucrative contract with a 
corporation Neo-Venus Construction (NEVEC), engaged in preparing the planet for 
colonization. Arriving on EDN III, Jim joined the pioneers on the basis of Coronis 
and began to study the unexplored areas and extraction of samples of thermal energy 
- the most valuable resource necessary for survival in the harsh extremes of the planet. 
Thermal energy stocks belonging NEVEC, coming to an end, so that the fate of the mission 
of the colonists on the basis of Coronis depends on the natural sources that they will be 
able to discover and learn. Keenly aware that this is a great opportunity to break large 
sum but still secure a speedy return home to his family, Jim, decided to challenge the 
inhospitable planet and its native inhabitants - aggressive and bloodthirsty locusts.
